summary: This document is an email communication from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated May 26, 2010. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the information contained within and suggests that it may be protected by attorney-client privilege. It also includes a warning against unauthorized use or disclosure of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating the communication is confidential and may be privileged.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, which is directed to him and contains confidential information.

keyFacts: The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email's content is prohibited.
